about_the_game:
Save Elizy - is a cooperative survival horror game designed to test the nerves of 1-4 players. Dragged into a dark story, the exorcists must uncover the secrets of a mysterious house that is gripped by otherworldly forces. You have to fight an ancient evil and help each other. Demons and toys will stand in your way, which will not refuse to feast on your body parts, if they catch you, of course. Run and hide, save Eliza, but remember - don't let yourself be taken to Hell.

TAKE THE FIGHT AGAINST EVIL INTO YOUR OWN HANDS


  • Assemble a team - In the company of 1-4 exorcists, find out the secrets of the mystical house, find out the story of Eliza and try to save her.

  • Take care of your limbs - Demons will want to mock you, gradually leaving you without arms, head and legs before finally taking you to Hell.

  • Cute toys - In your adventure you will meet Eliza's favorite toys, do not let yourself be fooled by them. They can be much scarier than they seem.

TORN OUT PAGES OF HISTORY


  • The mystery of the gloomy house - You have to look into the face of endless evil, which has nothing to stop at. The main question is where it came from and what it did to the inhabitants of the house. Where did you come from in it, and what invisible force makes you get up and walk on, even having lost all your limbs. Get to know your enemies, understand yourself and become stronger.

  • Eliza's Diary - Collect the missing pages of the diary and learn the story on behalf of Eliza. The girl is a lover of drawing, every day she made notes about the events surrounding her, attaching her drawings to them. Each attempt will reward the exorcist with a piece of Eliza's notes and make him stronger.

  • The fog of the mind - Occult forces are not as banal as it may seem to us, Eliza also lived an ordinary life, including a lamp at night, which protected her from all possible monsters questioning the infinitely rich childish imagination. The magic flashlight did not help her, and now You will become her delicious sip, which will free her from the thirst that torments her.

Dragged into a dark story, the exorcists must uncover the secrets of a mysterious house that is gripped by otherworldly forces. You have to fight an ancient evil and help each other. name: Save Elizy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 or new-gen i3 / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1660S
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Save Elizy - is a cooperative survival horror game for 1-4 players. Your path is blocked by demons who will leave you without limbs. Run and hide, save Eliza, but remember - don't let yourself be taken to Hell.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Danish, Indonesian, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
